questionTitle: No one in the football match was so versatile ........... he was.
Personally, I do all my shopping locally and prefer to deal with local ..................
Daisy and Mary are in the kitchen. ....................... are in the kitchen.
Something you buy at a good price ................... as a bargain.
My friend paid me a visit. She..............
A business has to pay a lot for ................. on TV.
The authority decided to .................... some narrow streets.
It took us a long time to get there. It was ....................... journey.
She doesn't like stories ........................ have unhappy endings.
You'll find the prices of our goods in our published .....................
They've been ................ with the same company for years.
The device ................ on top of buildings to pick up a TV signal is called an aerial.
